update t_acne_images
acneUserId = #{acneuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
postTime = #{posttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
authorith = #{authorith,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where imageId = #{imageid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_acne_images set acneUserId = #{acneuserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, postTime = #{posttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authorith = #{authorith,jdbcType=INTEGER}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where imageId = #{imageid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t_acne_images.* from t_acne_images right join t_acne_user on t_acne_user.userId = t_acne_images.acneUserId where authorith = 0 and available = 1 order by postTime desc

select
from t_acne_images where acneUserId = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into t_acne_images(acneUserId, postTime, path) values (#{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{path, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
update t_acne_user set avatar = #{path, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userId = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT};
